io.simplesource.data

Class Result<E,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.simplesource.data.Result<E,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - on failure there will be a NonEmptyList of error instances with an error value of this type.
    A - when successful there will be a contained value of this type.

    public abstract class Result<E,A>
extends Object
    A Result is either a success containing a value of the specified type, or a failure with a list value errors.

      • success

        public static <E,S> Result<E,S> success(S s)
        Factory method to creates a succesful Result from a value.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The error type for failures.
        S - when successful there will be a contained value this type.
        Parameters:
        s - value that will be lifted into this Result
        Returns:
        new success Result containing value provided.

      • failure

        @SafeVarargs
public static <E,S> Result<E,S> failure(E error,
                                                     E... errors)
        Factory method to creates a Failed Result from a array value of error
        Type Parameters:
        E - The error type for failures.
        S - when successful there will be a contained value this type.
        Parameters:
        error - the first cause of Result to be failed
        errors - a variable argument list of further causes of failure
        Returns:
        new failed Result containing the failed errors

      • failure

        public static <E,S> Result<E,S> failure(NonEmptyList<E> errors)
        Factory method to creates a Failed Result from a {@link NonEmptyList< E >}}
        Type Parameters:
        E - The error type for failures.
        S - when successful there will be a contained value this type.
        Parameters:
        errors - what caused this Result to failed
        Returns:
        new failed Result containing the failed errors

      • fold

        public abstract <T> T fold(java.util.function.Function<NonEmptyList<E>,T> f,
                           java.util.function.Function<A,T> s)
        Turn this Result into a destination type by supplying functions from the list of failure errors, or a function from the contained value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The target return type
        Parameters:
        f - a function to apply to the list of errors for failure, if any
        s - a function to apply to successfully updated aggregate value
        Returns:
        the target type returned in either the success or the failure cases

      • failureReasons

        public Optional<NonEmptyList<E>> failureReasons()
        If this is a failure, return the error reasons for that failure, if not return nothing.
        Returns:
        the nonempty list of failures
